description:
I'm shy and more reserved. I'm friendly, caring a little weird. But I'm better once you know me. I'm kind of a goof (my girls think I'm weird):b I'm a big gal (working on that though it will take time.) I've got tattoos, scars, piercings (all in the head reqion.)
I'm a smidge of a nerd, I loooooove Anime/ manga, like most marvel movies, enjoy writing, being on the computer, walking, swimming. I like to think I'm crafty I enjoy sewing, attempting to make jewelry.

I have 2 balls of energy who are my number one. So if that’s not your thing I appreciate your time but probably won’t work.

....
I just want to put out there again that I'm rather shy and don't have much experience in the dating scene. I'm not looking for hookups (there are some sites just for that.) Wish to meet people and maybe make a connection. 
So looking for a nice guy I connect with maybe have some things in common with. Whose patient and a cutie wouldn't hurt.:p
I tend to be attracted to the type of guys who wouldn't be into me... Unfortunately.
